evidence.claim: UASI leverages AWS for cloud services and data processing capabilities.
They utilize Azure for application hosting and health services.
UASI implements HL7 and FHIR standards for health data interoperability.
Their architecture supports X12 and EDI transactions for health claims processing.
They employ Snowflake for data warehousing solutions.

icp.icp_reason: No specific evidence of X12 transaction handling found.
